觀眾 [ guān zhòng ]: spectators; audience; visitors (to an exhibition etc)
觀察 [ guān chá ]: to observe; to watch; to survey; to examine; observation; view; perspective; Classifiers: 个
觀點 [ guān diǎn ]: point of view; viewpoint; standpoint; Classifiers: 个

heisig_chinese_memo: Storks are good at delivery because they can observe everything from high up thereby seeing the best path to take. &nbsp
Ru_trainchinese:
guān: (графема) смотреть, наблюдать
guān: (графема) вид, наружность, облик; взгляд, мнение
guàn: (сущ) даосский храм
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You see crotches when you observe porn.
origin_of_ch_char_book: (觀, 观, guan, observe) This symbol is composed of a bird with a mouth on each side and a person watching it carefully (見, 见, jian=chien, see; meet with). It shows a bird crying or singing loudly and looking around carefully. Such a bird is a stork or crane. The character has also come to mean “to observe, to enjoy the scenary.”
humanum_full_description_en:
The original meaning of " Guan " is to see, but it can be called Lou Guan and Tai Guan based on tall and distant buildings.

Oracle uses "雈" and "雚" to mean " view ", see "雈" and "雚".

Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning to indicate careful observation. Zhongshan Wang’s square pot: "Ming Cai (qi) is in the pot while viewing Yan”. " Cai " is pronounced as " qi ", which means that it is clearly engraved on the pot and often viewed. "easy. "Xi Ci": "When you look up, you see the image in the sky, and when you look down, you see the law in the ground." Also used as a surname.

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period were used as the original meaning to express observation, "Guodian Chujian. Jane 37: "The King of Guanwen 𢛳", "Book of Rites. "Mao Yi": "Guanwen King's Virtue".

"Said Wen": "Looking at it, seeing it clearly. Seeing it, sounding. 𩁰(𥍊), looking at ancient prose from 囧."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscriptions start with " see " as the meaning sign, and "雚" as the sound sign. The original meaning is to observe and observe.
humanum_full_description:
「觀」的本義是看，可憑高望遠的建築物稱為樓觀、臺觀。

　　甲骨文以「雈」、「雚」表示「觀」，參見「雈」、「雚」。

　　金文用作本義，表示仔細觀看，中山王方壺：「明蔡(契)之於壺而時觀焉」，「蔡」讀作「契」，表示清楚地刻在壺上而時常觀看。《易．繫辭》：「仰則觀象於天，俯則觀法於地。」又用作姓氏。

　　戰國竹簡用作本義，表示觀察，《郭店楚簡．緇衣》簡37：「觀文王𢛳」，《禮記．緇衣》：「觀文王之德」。

　　《說文》：「觀，諦視也。从見，雚聲。𩁰(𥍊)，古文觀从囧。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「見」為意符，「雚」為聲符，本義是觀看、觀察。

  • Chinese Definition:
  • Chinese Definition:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 雚 [ guàn ] heron; small cup
    • 見 [ jiàn ] to see, to observe, to meet, to appear
①看，察看：觀看。觀止(讚歎所看到的事物極端完美，無以復加)。觀風(ａ．暗中察看動靜，以定行止；b．觀察民間風俗習慣，生活狀態)。觀陣。觀賞。觀察。觀感。參觀。
②看到的景象或樣子：觀瞻(ａ．事物的外觀、景象及其留給人們的印象；b．注視，瞻望)。大觀。奇觀。
③對事物的看法、認識：觀點。觀念。主觀。客觀。世界觀。

②古代宮門前的雙闕。
③樓臺：樓觀。臺觀。
④姓氏。

「 觀 」的本義是看，可憑高望遠的建築物稱為樓觀、臺觀。 甲骨文以「 雈 」、「 雚 」表示「 觀 」，參見「 雈 」、「 雚 」。 金文用作本義，表示仔細觀看，中山王方壺：「明蔡(契)之於壺而時觀焉」，「 蔡 」讀作「 契 」，表示清楚地刻在壺上而時常觀看。《易．繫辭》：「仰則觀象於天，俯則觀法於地。」又用作姓氏。 戰國竹簡用作本義，表示觀察，《郭店楚簡．緇衣》簡37：「觀文王𢛳」，《禮記．緇衣》：「觀文王之德」。 《說文》：「觀，諦視也。从見，雚聲。𩁰(𥍊)，古文觀从囧。」
The original meaning of " Guan" is to see, but it can be called Lou Guan and Tai Guan based on tall and distant buildings. Oracle uses " 雈" and " 雚" to mean " view", see " 雈" and " 雚". Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning to indicate careful observation. Zhongshan Wang’s square pot: "Ming Cai (qi) is in the pot while viewing Yan”. " Cai" is pronounced as " qi", which means that it is clearly engraved on the pot and often viewed. "easy. "Xi Ci": "When you look up, you see the image in the sky, and when you look down, you see the law in the ground." Also used as a surname. The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period were used as the original meaning to express observation, "Guodian Chujian. Jane 37: "The King of Guanwen 𢛳", "Book of Rites. "Mao Yi": "Guanwen King's Virtue". "Said Wen": "Looking at it, seeing it clearly. Seeing it, sounding. 𩁰(𥍊), looking at ancient prose from 囧."

觀字的基本解释

觀
guān

觀
guàn
均见“观”。

觀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guān］
［《廣韻》古丸切，平桓，見。］
“观1”的繁体字。“覌1”的繁体字。亦作“観1”。
(1)观看；观览。
(2)观察；察看。
(3)示范；显示。
(4)引申为示意。
(5)游览。
(6)玩赏。
(7)多。
(8)鉴戒；借鉴。
(9)引申为效法。
(10)容饰；形态。
(11)景象。
(12)对事物的认识或看法。
(13)通“勸”。
(14)通“涫”。沸滚。
(15)占卜。
(16)卦名。六十四卦之一，坤下巽上。
[②]［guàn］
［《廣韻》古玩切，去换，見。］
“观2”的繁体字。“覌2”的繁体字。亦作“観2”。
(1)古代宫门外的双阙。
(2)楼台。
(3)京观。
(4)道教的庙宇。
(5)古国名。
(6)姓。春秋楚有观射父。见《国语·楚语下》。

觀字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【見字部】　觀； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1138第14
〔古文〕???【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?古玩切，官去聲。【說文】諦視也。【韻會】所觀也，示也。【易·觀卦】大觀在上，順而巽，中正以觀天下。【朱註】觀者，有以中正示人而爲人所仰也。【書·益稷】予欲觀古人之象。【傳】欲觀示法象之服制。觀，舊音官，陸音工喚切。【周禮·冬官考工記】㮚氏爲量。嘉量旣成，以觀四國。【註】以觀示四方，使放象之。【前漢·宣帝紀】觀以珍寶。【師古曰】觀，示也。　又容觀，容貌儀觀也。【禮·玉藻】旣服習容觀玉聲乃出。　又【爾雅·釋詁】多也。【詩·周頌】奄觀銍艾。【箋】奄，久。觀，多也。一音官。　又【爾雅·釋宮】觀謂之闕。【註】宮門雙闕。【疏】雉門之旁名觀。又名闕。【白虎通】上懸法象，其狀巍巍然高大，謂之象魏。使人觀之，謂之觀也。【三輔黃圖】周置兩觀，以表宮門。登之可以遠觀，故謂之觀。【左傳·僖五年】公旣視朔，遂登觀臺，以望而書，禮也。【註】臺上構屋，可以遠觀者也。　又【廣韻】樓觀。【韻會】道宮謂之觀。【史記·封禪書】仙人好樓

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guān］
["Guangyun" Guwan cut, Pinghuan, see you. ]
Traditional characters of "观1". Traditional characters for "覌1". Also known as "観1".
(1) Watching; viewing.
(2) Observe; observe.
(3) Demonstration; display.
(4) The extension is indicative.
(5) Tour.
(6) Play and appreciate.
(7) More.
(8) Enlightenment; reference.
(9) The extension is to imitate.
(10) Appearance; form.
(11) Scenery.
(12) Knowledge or perception of things.
(13) Through "persuade".
(14) Through "涫". Boiling.
(15) Divination.
(16) The hexagram name. One of the sixty-four hexagrams, Kun is down and Sunda is up.
[②]［guàn］
["Guangyun" antiques cut, change it, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "观2". Traditional characters for "覌2". Also known as "観2".
(1) Shuangque outside the ancient palace gate.
(2) Terraces.
(3) Jingguan.
(4) Taoist temples.
(5) Ancient country name.
(6) Last name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Chu Youguan shoots his father. See "Mandarin · Chu Yuxia".
View
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youji 1】【See the Department of Words】　观; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1138 Page 14
[Ancient text]??? [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun]? Antiques are cut, the official goes to the sound. [Said the text] Di Shi also. [Rhyme Club] What you see is what you see. [Yi·Guan Gua] The grand view is on the top, and the sundae is smooth, and Zhongzheng is to view the world. [Zhu Note] The viewers are admired by others for showing the righteousness. 【Book·Yiji】I want to see the image of the ancients. [Biography] Desire to observe and show the service system of Dhamma. Guan, the old sound official, Lu Yingong called for cutting. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] 㮚 Shi is the measure. Appreciate the amount of success, to observe the four countries. [Note] To show the Quartet by observing, to place the image. 【Pre-Han·Xuandi Ji】Looking at treasures. [Shi Gu said] Observe and show.　It's also good-looking, and good-looking. 【Rite·Yuzao】The sound of jade is coming out.　[Erya·Shixu] more. 【Poetry·Song of Zhou】Amazing Kuaiai. 【Jian】I am dying, for a long time. View, too much. One tone official.　[Erya·Shigong] View that is the fault. [Note] Double Que at the gate of the palace. 【Sparse】The bystander of the Pheasant Gate. Also known as Que. 【Baihutong】The image is suspended from the top, and its shape is majestic and tall, which is called the image of Wei. To make people look at it is also called the view. [Three auxiliary yellow pictures] Zhou Zhizhi two views, to show the palace gate. Deng Zhi can see from a distance, so it is called the view. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Five Years] Gong Yang looked at Shuo, and then climbed to the viewing platform, reading books with hope, and rituals. [Note] On-stage structures can be viewed from a distance.　[Guangyun] Lou Guan. [Rhyme] Dao Palace is the view. [Historical Records · Feng Chan Book] Immortal Hao Lou
